title: Registration
abstract: Registration will open at 09.00 AM at Level 21, Microsoft Auditorium.

title: MonkeyFest 2018 Keynote - Xamarin Right Now
abstract: Laurent Bugnion (CDA@Microsoft) and Ben Ishiyama-Levy (Chief Monkey) run through all the latest magical stuff that Xamarin enables you to do right now.

title: Turbocharged platform development with Xamarin and Blazor
abstract: Blazor is a .NET web framework that runs in any browser. Authoring Blazor apps uses C#/Razor and HTML. No JavaScript needed. Blazor uses only the latest web standards. No plugins or transpilation needed. It runs in the browser on a real .NET runtime (Mono) implemented in WebAssembly that executes normal .NET assemblies. It works in older browsers too by falling back to an asm.js based .NET runtime. Xamarin.Forms exposes a complete cross-platform UI toolkit for .NET developers, allowing to build fully native Android, iOS, Universal Windows Platform, Linux, MacOs, Tizen, tvOS, watchOS, PWA apps using C# in Visual Studio. Using both technologies in parallel allows development acceleration of 360 portal ecosystems complete with native mobile apps, mobile PWA, LOB website through code, CI and expertise sharing.

title: Build Better App with Machine Learning
abstract: Build a machine-learning model that recognizes handwritten digits. Then deploy it as a Web service and build a client app that connects to it and identifies the digits that you draw.

title: Bot Framework with Xamarin
abstract: The Bot Builder SDK for .NET is an easy-to-use framework for developing bots using Visual Studio and Windows. The SDK leverages C# to provide a familiar way for .NET developers to create powerful bots.This session walks you through building a bot using the Bot Application with Xamarin.

title: AMA | Closing
abstract: Ask Me Anything with our Xamarin Experts
